isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 3.5: CIRCUIT FUNCTION AND DIAGNOSTICS - ELECTRONIC CONTROL MODULE SELF DIAGNOSTICS - ECM INTERNAL SELF-TESTS

svcprocinfo.para: Use the Prolink EST to perform the self-tests. The test procedure checks the ECM's CPU, RAM, and ROM. The test may set the following flash codes.

svcsubproc.title: FLASH CODE 111 - ATA CODE PID 194 FMI 0 - ECM: NO ERRORS DETECTED
svcsubproc.para: Flash Code 111 indicates that the ECM has not detected any errors.

svcsubproc.title: FLASH CODE 625 - ATA CODE SID 254 FMI 9 - ECM: ECM INACTIVE BACKGROUND
svcsubproc.para: Code 625 indicates that the ECM Software is Faulty. Replace the ECM.

svcsubproc.title: FLASH CODE 631 - ATA CODE SID 240 FMI 2 - ECM: ROM TEST FAULT
svcsubproc.para: If code 631 is present, replace the ECM.

svcsubproc.title: FLASH CODE 632 - ATA CODE SID 254 FMI 12 - ECM: RAM/CPU TEST FAULT
svcsubproc.para: If code 632 is present, replace the ECM.
